references.reason: This paper introduces the foundation of denoising diffusion models which are leveraged in this paper for probability distribution modeling.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the effectiveness of diffusion models in image generation, inspiring the use of diffusion in this work.
This paper introduces the Transformer architecture, which is the backbone of many modern sequence models, including this paper's autoregressive model.

references.paper_title: Taming Transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the success of applying Transformers to high-resolution image generation, influencing this paper's approach to image generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image generation using latent diffusion models, serving as a direct comparison for the proposed method.
